name: HamRadioPropagationForecast
0:
”Alexa, open ham radio propagation”
”Alexa, launch ham radio propagation”
”Alexa, give me the ham radio propagation”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ham radio propagation
des: This skill will read out the solar weather such as the A and K index, Sunspot Number, X-Ray Classification and MUF if reported among other solar weather measurements. It will also read out the HF conditions by band for day time and night time conditions as well as VHF conditions for various VHF phenomenon.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
